name: Etherknox
description:
Welcome To Etherknox

Etherknox is a cool game where you create stuff with Creation Mode And play against a Built in Enemy in a shooter mode called Etherknox Mode

Right now Etherknox is in in-dev so the only mode right now is creation mode and there are only 4 blocks your can get theme by pressing keys 1 to 4

Controls ;

Arrow keys right and left to move

space to jump

keys 1-9 are block key 0 to go to cursor mode

click the block to place down
